text: Danial Farhan Tan is a Singaporean footballer who plays for Balestier Khalsa FC as a forward. He started his career with Woodlands Wellington in 2012. ==Club career== Tan started off his professional footballing career in 2012, signing for Woodands Wellington. However, he did not made any appearances for the club. He later went on to Tampines Rovers in 2013 and too, made zero appearances. He was clubless in 2014 but sign for Balestier Khalsa in 2015. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== .
